item.title: Misleading parking sign, 1st July
item.description:
Parking sign outside 19 Oldfield road has not been removed since parking space was burnt off. Consequently, it shows that parking is legal, when it is not. The sign just needs to be removed

item.title: Abandoned Caravan in alleyway, 1st July
item.description:
This is a continued and urgent concern regarding an abandoned caravan situated in the shared access alleyway between Woolwich Road and Troughton Road. This issue has been reported multiple times over the past three months, yet no action has been taken to resolve it. The caravan is directly obstructing access to my driveway. I currently have building work scheduled at my property, and the builders are struggling to access the site due to the caravan. The presence of the caravan poses serious health and safety risks. It creates a general sense of unease among residents, especially when left unattended for such an extended period. Something needs to be done!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woolwich Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic unbareable, 1st July
item.description:
I was stuck in traffic there for over half an hour at 8:00pm. Everyone was changing lanes and trying to cut in due to the the short traffic lights which are inadequate for the amount of traffic there is. It was dangerous and awful.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bounds Green Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Width barrier post lying on traffic island, 1st July
item.description:
One of the width barrier posts has been removed from it's mounting hole and is lying on the traffic island. Lorries and coaches are now coming through and causing danger, noise and congestion.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charlton Park Lane, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole cover broken, 1st July
item.description:
The manhole cover at the bottom of Eliot hill, just outside 2 Eliot Hill has come lose and each time a vehicle drives over, a loud sound is made. This is keeping our household awake at night as it echoes up the whole street. Thames water were recently doing some work on it and it needs to be placed back properly please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Eliot Hill, Deptford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Storm dainage covers replaced and absolute mess left behind, 1st July
item.description:
I have been living here (28 Hyde Park Gardens Mews) for over 2 decades and never once has there been a problem with the storm drainage. However for some reason it was replaced while I was away on business and an absolute mess of cement has been left behind! Right in front of my house door. I have attached an image of other work next door done very nicely for a water. This mess in front of my house door is unacceptable. It is like cement was just thrown around, then randomly spread and left to dry! Now even more works are being done on the water meter. I want to know what will be done about it to make is look as nice as next door in the image I provided. If nothing is done to rectify this in an acceptable and timely manner I will have to contact my lawyers and councilman.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Hyde Park Gardens Mews, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The tree are started to hang out vet in my garden and damage my fence I have had to have these cut few time along year and now find my self no longer being able to do this , there atarting to lean on my fence in which I spent a lot money on security, 1st July
